HEMAscRaper 2.0.0

    HEMA Rankings Dataset

    hema_rankings.Rd

    This dataset contains monthly ranking information for HEMA fighters, including performance metrics and associated club information.

    hema_rankings

    Format

    A data frame with 70,053 rows and 8 columns:

    rank

    Numeric. The ranking position of the fighter.

    fighter_id

    Numeric. Unique identifier for the fighter.

    fighter_name

    Character. Name of the fighter.

    category

    Character. The competition category (e.g., "Longsword (Mixed & Men's, Steel)").

    month

    Character. The month for which the ranking applies (e.g., "January 2025").

    weighted_rating

    Numeric. The weighted rating score for the fighter.

    club

    Character. The club with which the fighter is associated.

    month_date

    Date. The reference date within the month (e.g., "2025-01-22").

    Details

    The dataset also includes a column specification attribute (`spec`) that details the expected column types and records any parsing problems encountered when reading the data.

    Examples

    str(hema_rankings)
#> spc_tbl_ [70,053 × 8] (S3: spec_tbl_df/tbl_df/tbl/data.frame)
#>  $ rank           : num [1:70053] 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 NA ...
#>  $ fighter_id     : num [1:70053] 3263 1764 1060 711 8358 ...
#>  $ fighter_name   : chr [1:70053] "Antoni Olbrychski" "Kristian Guivarra" "Miro Lahtela" "Stephen Cheney" ...
#>  $ category       : chr [1:70053] "Longsword (Mixed & Men's, Steel)" "Longsword (Mixed & Men's, Steel)" "Longsword (Mixed & Men's, Steel)" "Longsword (Mixed & Men's, Steel)" ...
#>  $ month          : chr [1:70053] "January 2025" "January 2025" "January 2025" "January 2025" ...
#>  $ weighted_rating: num [1:70053] 2004 2000 1992 1975 1952 ...
#>  $ club           : chr [1:70053] "Akademia Szermierzy" "Vanguard Swordsmanship Academy" "EHMS" "Bucks Historical Longsword" ...
#>  $ month_date     : Date[1:70053], format: "2025-01-22" "2025-01-22" ...
#>  - attr(*, "spec")=
#>   .. cols(
#>   ..   rank = col_double(),
#>   ..   fighter_id = col_double(),
#>   ..   fighter_name = col_character(),
#>   ..   category = col_character(),
#>   ..   month = col_character(),
#>   ..   weighted_rating = col_double(),
#>   ..   club = col_character(),
#>   ..   month_date = col_date(format = "")
#>   .. )
#>  - attr(*, "problems")=<externalptr>
